title: P.C.F.H. Week: I’m Defensive!!
description:
Racheal is finding it difficult to be a good listener and loving wife to her husband without reacting negatively. - Dr. Laura: "Go be adorable to your husband."

Are you willing to treat kindly? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura's book: “The Proper Care and Feeding of Husbands”

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-the-proper-care-and-feeding-of-husbands

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura
